thread.title: BRIEF-Biocryst Pharmaceuticals Files Definitive Proxy Statement Related To Pending Merger With Idera Pharmaceuticals

title: BRIEF-Biocryst Pharmaceuticals Files Definitive Proxy Statement Related To Pending Merger With Idera Pharmaceuticals

organizations.name: pending merger with idera pharmaceuticals reuters

text:
April 2, 2018 / 12:09 PM / in a minute BRIEF-Biocryst Pharmaceuticals Files Definitive Proxy Statement Related To Pending Merger With Idera Pharmaceuticals Reuters Staff 
April 2 (Reuters) - Biocryst Pharmaceuticals Inc : 
* BIOCRYST PHARMACEUTICALS FILES DEFINITIVE PROXY STATEMENT IN CONNECTION WITH PENDING MERGER WITH IDERA PHARMACEUTICALS 
* ‍BIOCRYST SPECIAL MEETING OF STOCKHOLDERS SCHEDULED FOR MAY 9, 2018​ 
* ‍RECOMMEND THAT ALL CO’S STOCKHOLDERS VOTE “FOR” MERGER PROPOSAL WITH IDERA PHARMA​ 
* ‍RECOMMEND STOCKHOLDERS VOTE “FOR” BIOCRYST PROPOSALS SET FORTH IN PROXY STATEMENT, INCLUDING “FOR” MERGER PROPOSAL​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
